body:
Comment 1: 
http://golang.org/ref/spec#Constants
"There are boolean constants, rune constants, integer constants, floating-point
constants, complex constants, and string constants. Character, integer, floating-point,
and complex constants are collectively called numeric constants."

In the second sentence, s/Character/Rune/.
_Labels changed: removed **restrict-view-owner**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
